title: Bonus 13: Satan and the Origin of Evil
itunes:title: Bonus: Satan and the Origin of Evil
description: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I talk about Satan (ha'Satan, the adversary). In the Old Testament he is God's faithful prosecuting attorney. Only in the apocalyptic literature does he transform into the source of all evil. That is the Satan we find in the New Testament.
content:encoded: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I talk about Satan (ha'Satan, the adversary). In the Old Testament he is God's faithful prosecuting attorney. Only in the apocalyptic literature does he transform into the source of all evil. That is the Satan we find in the New Testament.
itunes:subtitle: Satan is not the person you think he is.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens, Stephen Guerra
